name: Mostly Harmless
description:
Somewhere in the galaxy lies an utterly insignificant little blue green planet.. Which has a problem..

A seemingly infinite number of asteroids are hurtling themselves towards the Earth, crashing into it's surface, causing trees to catch fire and explode. A most unfortunate circumstance.

Use the Earth's mostly harmless defense systems (a lone turret) to ward off asteroids and keep the trees alive as long as possible.


-

Potentially interesting fact; this game jam coincided with Earth day.
